attributes.action: Confirm that the Referendum vote was legal, binding and  "Not the best of three"
attributes.additional_details: Social media is awash with people in the minority who are clamouring for a second referendum already. This is not healthy for the country as a whole and can be simply clarified with one statement confirming the result stands.
attributes.background:
Leave voters appear to not understand how democracy works. An unambiguous statement confirming the result stands should be made as soon as possible so people can get on with their lives and allow the government to do its best on all our behalf to leave the EU with the best deal possible. 
Yours....

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134345
